_header: Young and old More and less
Note: For a later and abridged version see 3242.
_description: ‘How to hear Mass’ — fifty-seven 12-line stanzas, with one prefatory quatrain

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Ȝong & olde More and lassefful god hit is to here
                    Masse…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Kep vs from þe pyne of helleAMEN ffor
                    Charite
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title: Hou mon scholde here hys masse (see 2007)
